I had a minor issue and it was sorted promptly. Looking forward to all the amazing updates![/ld_testimonial][/ld_carousel_marquee_section][ld_carousel_marquee_section title=”Carousel Item” tab_id=”lqd-1622201316142-cb670199-b542″][ld_testimonial template=”style08″ title=”nickwhitemail” position=”Envato User” bg_color=”rgb(255, 255, 255)”]We have purchased 100’s of themes before and this one has got to be the best! The design options and features available are overwhelming and exciting at the same time. It is easy to use and flexible. We are honestly very impressed. The customer service is top notch with quick responses and help. We look forward to creating a great website with this template. Great Job LiquidThemes[/ld_testimonial][/ld_carousel_marquee_section][ld_carousel_marquee_section title=”Carousel Item” tab_id=”lqd-1622202150348-03766fe4-1417″][ld_testimonial template=”style08″ title=”script-translator” position=”Envato User” bg_color=”rgb(255, 255, 255)”]You gotta be kidding me. This theme is more than AMAZING. The only major thing right now what’s missing is, Elementor support + ready to use widgets for and template library. No need to say GLWS, coz u don’t need luck to sell this theme. Can’t wait for the Elementor update. Freaking awesome job guys. Congrats.[/ld_testimonial][/ld_carousel_marquee_section][ld_carousel_marquee_section title=”Carousel Item” tab_id=”lqd-1622202014733-af0baea6-5bd5″][ld_testimonial template=”style08″ title=”schnacker66″ position=”Envato User” bg_color=”rgb(255, 255, 255)”]Theme is really great with many options to work with, but more importantly It has a great customer support. They fixed my small issues I had with the theme within real short time. Great communication too, thanks matt![/ld_testimonial][/ld_carousel_marquee_section][ld_carousel_marquee_section title=”Carousel Item” tab_id=”lqd-1622202071125-12a2113f-7067″][ld_testimonial template=”style08″ title=”nickwhitemail” position=”Envato User” bg_color=”rgb(255, 255, 255)”]We have purchased 100’s of themes before and this one has got to be the best! The design options and features available are overwhelming and exciting at the same time. It is easy to use and flexible. We are honestly very impressed. The customer service is top notch with quick responses and help. We look forward to creating a great website with this template. Great Job LiquidThemes[/ld_testimonial][/ld_carousel_marquee_section][ld_carousel_marquee_section title=”Carousel Item” tab_id=”lqd-1622201327401-ce70c208-fe2d”][ld_testimonial template=”style08″ title=”script-translator” position=”Envato User” bg_color=”rgb(255, 255, 255)”]You gotta be kidding me.
